scripts.dev: npm run build:ts && bun run dist/server/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: rm -rf dist/public && mkdir -p dist/public && cp -r public/* dist/public/ && bun build src/public/app/main.ts --outdir dist/public/app --target browser --format esm
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && bun run dist/server/index.js
